quotes.text: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: In the end, only three things matter: how much you loved, how gently you lived, and how gracefully you let go of things not meant for you.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The root of suffering is attachment.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The way is not in the sky. The way is in the heart.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Better than a thousand hollow words, is one word that brings peace.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Your work is to discover your work and then with all your heart to give yourself to it.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The trouble is, you think you have time.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: To understand everything is to forgive everything.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: A jug fills drop by drop.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Just as a candle cannot burn without fire, men cannot live without a spiritual life.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: We are shaped by our thoughts; we become what we think. When the mind is pure, joy follows like a shadow that never leaves.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The greatest prayer is patience.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Every morning we are born again. What we do today is what matters most.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The past is already gone, the future is not yet here. There's only one moment for you to live.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: If you light a lamp for somebody, it will also brighten your path.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The tongue like a sharp knife... Kills without drawing blood.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: A man is not called wise because he talks and talks again; but if he is peaceful, loving and fearless then he is in truth called wise.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: When you realize how perfect everything is, you will tilt your head back and laugh at the sky.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The only way to bring peace to the earth is to learn to make our own life peaceful.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: Feelings come and go like clouds in a windy sky. Conscious breathing is my anchor.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: The present moment is filled with joy and happiness. If you are attentive, you will see it.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: Understanding means throwing away your knowledge.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: The seed of suffering in you may be strong, but don't wait until you have no more suffering before allowing yourself to be happy.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: The most precious gift we can offer others is our presence.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: The mind is like water. When it's turbulent, it's difficult to see. When it's calm, everything becomes clear.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: You are the sky. Everything else is just the weather.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: The most difficult times for many of us are the ones we give ourselves.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: Nothing ever goes away until it has taught us what we need to know.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: The greatest obstacle to connecting with our joy is resentment.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: The best way to take care of the future is to take care of the present moment.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: The most fundamental aggression to ourselves, the most fundamental harm we can do to ourselves, is to remain ignorant by not having the courage and the respect to look at ourselves honestly and gently.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: The essence of bravery is being without self-deception.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: The most important point is to accept yourself and stand on your two feet.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.text: In the beginner's mind there are many possibilities, but in the expert's there are few.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.text: When you do something, you should burn yourself completely, like a good bonfire, leaving no trace of yourself.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.text: The most important thing is to find out what is the most important thing.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.text: When you try to stop activity to achieve passivity, your very effort fills you with activity.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.text: The most difficult thing is always to keep your beginner's mind.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.text: The practice of Zen is forgetting the self in the act of uniting with something.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.text: The most important thing is to express your true nature in the simplest, most adequate way and to appreciate it in the smallest existence.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.text: The way to control your cow or sheep is to give them a large, spacious meadow.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.text: The most important thing is to find out what is the most important thing.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.text: The whole secret of existence is to have no fear. Never fear what will become of you, depend on no one. Only the moment you reject all help are you freed.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The only way to bring peace to the earth is to learn to make our own life peaceful.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.text: When you realize how perfect everything is, you will tilt your head back and laugh at the sky.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The only way to bring peace to the earth is to learn to make our own life peaceful.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: The greatest wealth is contentment. The greatest happiness is peace of mind.
quotes.author: Master Hsing Yun

quotes.text: A person who is truly happy is one who can enjoy the scenery on a detour.
quotes.author: Master Hsing Yun

quotes.text: The greatest charity is to help others to help themselves.
quotes.author: Master Hsing Yun

quotes.text: The greatest wisdom is to know that you know nothing.
quotes.author: Master Hsing Yun

quotes.text: The greatest strength is gentleness.
quotes.author: Master Hsing Yun

quotes.text: The greatest joy is to be free from worry.
quotes.author: Master Hsing Yun

quotes.text: The greatest wealth is health.
quotes.author: Master Hsing Yun

quotes.text: The greatest success is to be able to help others succeed.
quotes.author: Master Hsing Yun

quotes.text: The greatest virtue is to be able to forgive.
quotes.author: Master Hsing Yun

quotes.text: The greatest power is to be able to control oneself.
quotes.author: Master Hsing Yun

quotes.text: The greatest happiness is to be able to give happiness to others.
quotes.author: Master Hsing Yun

quotes.text: The greatest peace is to be able to live in harmony with others.
quotes.author: Master Hsing Yun

quotes.text: The greatest wisdom is to know how to be content with what one has.
quotes.author: Master Hsing Yun

quotes.text: The greatest courage is to be able to face one's own mistakes.
quotes.author: Master Hsing Yun

quotes.text: The greatest love is to be able to love without expecting anything in return.
quotes.author: Master Hsing Yun

quotes.text: To study the Buddha Way is to study the self. To study the self is to forget the self. To forget the self is to be enlightened by all things.
quotes.author: Dogen Zenji

quotes.text: When you find your place where you are, practice occurs.
quotes.author: Dogen Zenji

quotes.text: The entire universe is the true human body.
quotes.author: Dogen Zenji

quotes.text: Do not think that you will necessarily be aware of your own enlightenment.
quotes.author: Dogen Zenji

quotes.text: The practice of zazen is the direct expression of our true nature.
quotes.author: Dogen Zenji

quotes.text: The way is not difficult for those who have no preferences.
quotes.author: Dogen Zenji

quotes.text: The mind that is not disturbed by things as they occur is the true mind.
quotes.author: Dogen Zenji

quotes.text: The practice of the Way is not a matter of time.
quotes.author: Dogen Zenji

quotes.text: The entire universe is the true human body. The entire universe is the gate of liberation.
quotes.author: Dogen Zenji

quotes.text: The practice of the Way is not a matter of time.
quotes.author: Dogen Zenji

quotes.text: If you let go a little, you will have a little peace. If you let go a lot, you will have a lot of peace. If you let go completely, you will have complete peace.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.text: The mind is like a monkey swinging from branch to branch. We have to train it to stay still.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.text: Everything is teaching us. Even a tree can teach us. When we see that it sways back and forth in the wind, we see that it's not rigid, and we can learn to be flexible too.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.text: If you want to see the truth, then don't hold on to opinions for or against anything.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.text: The heart is like a garden. It can grow compassion or fear, resentment or love. What seeds will you plant there?
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.text: If you want to be free, you must be willing to let go of everything.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.text: The practice is not about being perfect. It's about being present.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.text: When you understand the nature of things, you don't need to force anything.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.text: The mind is everything. What you think, you become.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.text: If you want to be happy, you must first understand that you are the source of your own happiness.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.text: The practice is not about changing yourself. It's about seeing yourself clearly.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.text: When you understand the nature of impermanence, you will find peace.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.text: The mind is like water. When it's still, it reflects everything clearly.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.text: If you want to be free, you must be willing to let go of everything.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.text: The practice is not about being perfect. It's about being present.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.text: Zazen is good for nothing. That's why it's so valuable.
quotes.author: Kodo Sawaki

quotes.text: The self is a fiction. When you sit, you are just sitting.
quotes.author: Kodo Sawaki

quotes.text: Don't be fooled by your own thoughts. They are just passing clouds.
quotes.author: Kodo Sawaki

quotes.text: The way is not about becoming something. It's about being nothing.
quotes.author: Kodo Sawaki

quotes.text: When you sit, you are the universe sitting.
quotes.author: Kodo Sawaki

quotes.text: Don't try to be special. Just be ordinary.
quotes.author: Kodo Sawaki

quotes.text: The mind that seeks is the mind that suffers.
quotes.author: Kodo Sawaki

quotes.text: When you sit, you are the Buddha. When you stand, you are the Buddha. When you walk, you are the Buddha.
quotes.author: Kodo Sawaki

quotes.text: Don't try to understand. Just sit.
quotes.author: Kodo Sawaki

quotes.text: The way is not about gaining anything. It's about losing everything.
quotes.author: Kodo Sawaki

quotes.text: When you sit, you are the entire universe.
quotes.author: Kodo Sawaki

quotes.text: Don't try to be someone else. Just be yourself.
quotes.author: Kodo Sawaki

quotes.text: The way is not about becoming. It's about unbecoming.
quotes.author: Kodo Sawaki

quotes.text: When you sit, you are the entire world.
quotes.author: Kodo Sawaki

quotes.text: Don't try to be special. Just be ordinary.
quotes.author: Kodo Sawaki

quotes.text: The nature of mind is like space. It is vast, open, and free from limitations.
quotes.author: Kalu Rinpoche

quotes.text: When we understand that all phenomena are like dreams, we are free from attachment.
quotes.author: Kalu Rinpoche

quotes.text: The essence of meditation is to rest in the natural state of mind.
quotes.author: Kalu Rinpoche

quotes.text: Compassion is the wish that all beings be free from suffering.
quotes.author: Kalu Rinpoche

quotes.text: The true nature of mind is like a mirror, reflecting everything without judgment.
quotes.author: Kalu Rinpoche

quotes.text: When we recognize the nature of mind, we discover our innate wisdom.
quotes.author: Kalu Rinpoche

quotes.text: The practice of loving-kindness begins with ourselves.
quotes.author: Kalu Rinpoche

quotes.text: In the space of awareness, all thoughts are like clouds passing through the sky.
quotes.author: Kalu Rinpoche

quotes.text: The path to enlightenment is the path of letting go.
quotes.author: Kalu Rinpoche

quotes.text: When we understand impermanence, we understand the nature of reality.
quotes.author: Kalu Rinpoche

quotes.text: The mind is like a vast ocean, and thoughts are like waves on its surface.
quotes.author: Kalu Rinpoche

quotes.text: True peace comes from understanding the nature of mind.
quotes.author: Kalu Rinpoche

quotes.text: The practice of meditation is the practice of being present.
quotes.author: Kalu Rinpoche

quotes.text: When we see the true nature of things, we are free from delusion.
quotes.author: Kalu Rinpoche

quotes.text: The heart of practice is to recognize our true nature.
quotes.author: Kalu Rinpoche

quotes.text: The mind is like a mirror. It reflects everything but is not affected by what it reflects.

quotes.text: When we see the true nature of things, we are free from delusion.
quotes.author: Dilgo Khyentse Rinpoche

quotes.text: The mind is like a clear sky. Thoughts are like clouds that come and go.
quotes.author: Mingyur Rinpoche

quotes.text: Happiness is not something you find. It's something you are.
quotes.author: Mingyur Rinpoche

quotes.text: The practice of meditation is not about changing who you are, but about recognizing who you are.
quotes.author: Mingyur Rinpoche

quotes.text: When we understand that our thoughts are not who we are, we find freedom.
quotes.author: Mingyur Rinpoche

quotes.text: The nature of mind is like space. It is vast, open, and free from limitations.
quotes.author: Mingyur Rinpoche

quotes.text: Compassion is not just a feeling. It's a way of being in the world.
quotes.author: Mingyur Rinpoche

quotes.text: The practice of awareness is the practice of being fully present.
quotes.author: Mingyur Rinpoche

quotes.text: When we see the true nature of mind, we discover our innate wisdom.
quotes.author: Mingyur Rinpoche

quotes.text: The path to peace is not about changing the world, but about changing our relationship to it.
quotes.author: Mingyur Rinpoche

quotes.text: The practice of meditation is the practice of being at home in the present moment.
quotes.author: Mingyur Rinpoche

quotes.text: When we understand that everything is impermanent, we can appreciate each moment fully.
quotes.author: Mingyur Rinpoche

quotes.text: The mind is like a vast ocean, and thoughts are like waves on its surface.
quotes.author: Mingyur Rinpoche

quotes.text: The practice of awareness is the practice of being fully alive.
quotes.author: Mingyur Rinpoche

quotes.text: When we see the true nature of things, we are free from delusion.
quotes.author: Mingyur Rinpoche

quotes.text: The heart of practice is to recognize our true nature.
quotes.author: Mingyur Rinpoche

quotes.text: The mind is like a clear sky. Thoughts are like clouds that come and go.

quotes.author: Tsoknyi Rinpoche

quotes.text: The practice of meditation is not about changing who you are, but about recognizing who you are.
quotes.author: Tsoknyi Rinpoche

quotes.author: Tsoknyi Rinpoche

quotes.author: Tsoknyi Rinpoche

quotes.text: The practice of awareness is the practice of being fully alive.
quotes.author: Tsoknyi Rinpoche

quotes.text: When we see the true nature of things, we are free from delusion.
quotes.author: Tsoknyi Rinpoche

quotes.text: The heart of practice is to recognize our true nature.
quotes.author: Tsoknyi Rinpoche

quotes.text: The practice of meditation is not about achieving something, but about being something.
quotes.author: Tsoknyi Rinpoche

quotes.text: When we understand that our thoughts are not who we are, we find freedom.
quotes.author: Tsoknyi Rinpoche

quotes.text: The bad news is you're falling through the air, nothing to hang on to, no parachute. The good news is, there's no ground.
quotes.author: Chögyam Trungpa Rinpoche

quotes.text: The essence of warriorship, or the essence of human bravery, is refusing to give up on anyone or anything.
quotes.author: Chögyam Trungpa Rinpoche

quotes.text: The practice of meditation is not about trying to throw ourselves away and become something better. It's about befriending who we are.
quotes.author: Chögyam Trungpa Rinpoche

quotes.text: The key to feeling at home with your body, mind, and emotions, to feeling worthy to live on this earth, is to be willing to die, to make friends with impermanence.
quotes.author: Chögyam Trungpa Rinpoche

quotes.text: The essence of bravery is being without self-deception.
quotes.author: Chögyam Trungpa Rinpoche

quotes.text: The practice of mindfulness is not about trying to achieve anything at all. It's about allowing yourself to be exactly as you are.
quotes.author: Chögyam Trungpa Rinpoche

quotes.text: The path is not about becoming something. It's about unbecoming everything that isn't really you.
quotes.author: Chögyam Trungpa Rinpoche

quotes.text: The essence of warriorship is not being afraid of who you are.
quotes.author: Chögyam Trungpa Rinpoche

quotes.text: The practice of meditation is not about trying to throw ourselves away and become something better. It's about befriending who we are.
quotes.author: Chögyam Trungpa Rinpoche

quotes.text: The key to feeling at home with your body, mind, and emotions, to feeling worthy to live on this earth, is to be willing to die, to make friends with impermanence.
quotes.author: Chögyam Trungpa Rinpoche

quotes.text: The essence of bravery is being without self-deception.
quotes.author: Chögyam Trungpa Rinpoche

quotes.text: The practice of mindfulness is not about trying to achieve anything at all. It's about allowing yourself to be exactly as you are.
quotes.author: Chögyam Trungpa Rinpoche

quotes.text: The path is not about becoming something. It's about unbecoming everything that isn't really you.
quotes.author: Chögyam Trungpa Rinpoche

quotes.text: The essence of warriorship is not being afraid of who you are.
quotes.author: Chögyam Trungpa Rinpoche

quotes.text: The practice of meditation is not about trying to throw ourselves away and become something better. It's about befriending who we are.
quotes.author: Chögyam Trungpa Rinpoche
